title: Advice to a Prophet - "word of the weapons"

content.question: According to the speaker, the prophet’s “word of the weapons” (line 5) will probably not be heeded because

choices.label: human beings are interested in weapons
men and women are more concerned with love than with weapons
people have heard such talk too often before
people cannot comprehend abstract descriptions of power

content.answer: people cannot comprehend abstract descriptions of power

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
